name: Park Tool SCW-SET.3 Cone Wrench Set
description: Park Tool's cone wrenches are an industry standard.  Known for durability, quality, and precise fit, these wrenches will last for years. The Y-head design puts material where you want it for strength and durability, but they're still thin enough to use on the narrowest of adjusting cones.Hardened industrial-quality steel with military grade phosphate finish.Long, vinyl-dipped handle provides great leverage and comfort.Includes all cone wrenches produced by Park Tool:13 to 24mm in 1mm increments, plus 26 and 28mm.
